title: Profit-Forward Cocktail Audit
system_mod: When evaluating or optimizing cocktail specs for cost control, always consider portion size, modifier efficiency, shelf life, substitution opportunities, and garnish feasibility.
venue_context: A mid-sized American bistro with a 10-item cocktail list. Management is worried about liquor costs exceeding targets and wants to tighten without harming guest experience.
prompt: Can you review our cocktail list and suggest ways to protect margins while keeping the guest experience strong?
